title: Rare Vintage Rolex Submariner 1965
description: Authentic Rolex Submariner from 1965 in excellent condition. Includes original box and papers. Verified by certified watchmaker. A true collector's piece with historical significance.

title: Original Picasso Sketch - Signed
description: Authenticated original pencil sketch by Pablo Picasso, signed and dated 1952. Comes with certificate of authenticity from Sotheby's. Perfect for art collectors and investors.

title: MacBook Pro M3 Max 16-inch - Brand New
description: Sealed in box MacBook Pro M3 Max with 16-inch display, 64GB RAM, 2TB SSD. Latest generation, never opened. Perfect for professionals and creators.

title: Vintage 1967 Gibson Les Paul Standard
description: Rare 1967 Gibson Les Paul Standard in sunburst finish. All original hardware and electronics. Recently serviced and set up by professional luthier. A legendary guitar for serious musicians.

title: Luxury Yacht Charter - 7 Days Mediterranean
description: Exclusive 7-day yacht charter in the Mediterranean for up to 8 guests. Includes captain, crew, meals, and fuel. Available dates: June-August 2024. Experience luxury sailing at its finest.

title: Rare First Edition Harry Potter - Philosopher's Stone
description: First edition, first printing of Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone (UK edition) in excellent condition. One of only 500 copies printed. Includes original dust jacket. Extremely rare collector's item.

title: Tesla Model S Plaid - 2023 - Low Miles
description: 2023 Tesla Model S Plaid with only 2,500 miles. Midnight Silver Metallic with white interior. Full self-driving capability included. Like new condition, all service records available.
